books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.description: A novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald, set in the Jazz Age, depicting the decadence and excess of the era.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.description: A novel by Harper Lee, set in the American South, depicting racial injustice and the loss of innocence.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.description: A novel by J.D. Salinger, depicting the struggles of a teenage boy in New York City.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.description: A fantasy novel by J.R.R. Tolkien, depicting the quest to destroy a powerful ring and defeat an evil ruler.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.description: A fantasy novel by J.R.R. Tolkien, depicting the journey of a hobbit to reclaim a treasure from a dragon.
